item.text: In the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar, when Pontius Pilate was governor of Judea, and Herod was tetrarch of Galilee, and his brother Philip was tetrarch of the region of Iturea and Trachonitis, and Lysanias was tetrarch of Abilene,

<st data-num="1909" class="">during</st> the <st data-num="749">high priesthood</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="452" class="">Annas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2533" class="">Caiaphas</st>, the <st data-num="4487" class="">word</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="2197" class="">Zechariah</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2048" class="">wilderness</st>.<n id="3" />
He went into all the region around the Jordan River, preaching a baptism of repentance for the forgiveness of sins.

As it is written in the book of the words of the prophet Isaiah,

“The voice of one shouting in the wilderness:

‘Prepare the way for the Lord,

make his paths straight.

Every valley will be filled,

and every mountain and hill will be brought low,

and the crooked will be made straight,

and the rough ways will be made smooth,
and all humanity will see the salvation of God.’”
So John said to the crowds that came out to be baptized by him, “You offspring of vipers! Who warned you to flee from the coming wrath?

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">produce</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st><n id="2" /> that <st data-num="514" class="">proves</st> your <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3361">don’t</st> <st data-num="757">begin</st> to <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st>, ‘We <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st> as our <st data-num="3962" class="">father.’</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="1453">raise up</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> for <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="3037" class="">stones</st>!<n id="5" />
Even now the ax is laid at the root of the trees, and every tree that does not produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into the fire.”
So the crowds were asking him, “What then should we do?”

John<n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="2" /> “The person who <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="5509" class="">tunics</st><n id="3" /> must <st data-num="3330" class="">share</st> with the person who <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">none</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the person who <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1033" class="">food</st> must <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3668" class="">likewise</st>.”

<st data-num="5057">Tax collectors</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> to be <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1320">Teacher</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> should we <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st>?”

He <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="4238">Collect</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4119" class="">more</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3844" class="">than</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="1299" class="">required</st> to.”<n id="2" />
Then some soldiers also asked him, “And as for us—what should we do?” He told them, “Take money from no one by violence or by false accusation, and be content with your pay.”
While the people were filled with anticipation and they all wondered whether perhaps John could be the Christ,

<st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> them <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="907" class="">baptize</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> one <st data-num="2478">more powerful</st> than <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am is <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st>—I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2425" class="">worthy</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="3089" class="">untie</st> the <st data-num="2438" class="">strap</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5266" class="">sandals</st>. <st data-num="846" class="">He</st> will <st data-num="907" class="">baptize</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>.<n id="5" />
His winnowing fork is in his hand to clean out his threshing floor and to gather the wheat into his storehouse, but the chaff he will burn up with inextinguishable fire.”
And in this way, with many other exhortations, John proclaimed good news to the people.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when <st data-num="846" class="">John</st> <st data-num="1651" class="">rebuked</st> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5076" class="">tetrarch</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">because of</st> <st data-num="2266" class="">Herodias</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80">brother’s</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4012">because of</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4190">evil deeds</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2264" class="">he</st> had <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st>,
Herod added this to them all: He locked up John in prison.
Now when all the people were baptized, Jesus also was baptized. And while he was praying, the heavens opened,
and the Holy Spirit descended on him in bodily form like a dove. And a voice came from heaven, “You are my one dear Son; in you I take great delight.”
So Jesus, when he began his ministry, was about thirty years old. He was the son (as was supposed) of Joseph, the son of Heli,

the son of <st data-num="3158" class="">Matthat</st>, the son of <st data-num="3017" class="">Levi</st>, the son of <st data-num="3197" class="">Melchi</st>, the son of <st data-num="2388" class="">Jannai</st>, the son of <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st>,

the son of <st data-num="3161" class="">Mattathias</st>, the son of <st data-num="301" class="">Amos</st>, the son of <st data-num="3486" class="">Nahum</st>, the son of <st data-num="2069" class="">Esli</st>, the son of <st data-num="3477" class="">Naggai</st>,

the son of <st data-num="3092" class="">Maath</st>, the son of <st data-num="3161" class="">Mattathias</st>, the son of <st data-num="4584" class="">Semein</st>, the son of <st data-num="2501" class="">Josech</st>, the son of <st data-num="2448" class="">Joda</st>,

the son of <st data-num="2490" class="">Joanan</st>, the son of <st data-num="4488" class="">Rhesa</st>, the son of <st data-num="2216" class="">Zerubbabel</st>,<n id="1" /> the son of <st data-num="4528" class="">Shealtiel</st>,<n id="2" /> the son of <st data-num="3518" class="">Neri</st>,<n id="3" />

the son of <st data-num="3197" class="">Melchi</st>, the son of <st data-num="78" class="">Addi</st>, the son of <st data-num="2973" class="">Cosam</st>, the son of <st data-num="1678" class="">Elmadam</st>, the son of <st data-num="2262" class="">Er</st>,

the son of <st data-num="2424" class="">Joshua</st>, the son of <st data-num="1663" class="">Eliezer</st>, the son of <st data-num="2497" class="">Jorim</st>, the son of <st data-num="3158" class="">Matthat</st>, the son of <st data-num="3017" class="">Levi</st>,

the son of <st data-num="4826" class="">Simeon</st>, the son of <st data-num="2455" class="">Judah</st>, the son of <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st>, the son of <st data-num="2494" class="">Jonam</st>, the son of <st data-num="1662" class="">Eliakim</st>,

the son of <st data-num="3190" class="">Melea</st>, the son of <st data-num="3104" class="">Menna</st>, the son of <st data-num="3160" class="">Mattatha</st>, the son of <st data-num="3481" class="">Nathan</st>,<n id="1" /> the son of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>,<n id="2" />

the son of <st data-num="2421" class="">Jesse</st>, the son of <st data-num="5601" class="">Obed</st>, the son of <st data-num="1003" class="">Boaz</st>, the son of <st data-num="4527" class="">Sala</st>,<n id="1" /> the son of <st data-num="3476" class="">Nahshon</st>,

the son of <st data-num="284" class="">Amminadab</st>, the son of <st data-num="96">Admin</st>, the son of <st data-num="689" class="">Arni</st>,<n id="1" /> the son of <st data-num="2074" class="">Hezron</st>, the son of <st data-num="5329" class="">Perez</st>, the son of <st data-num="2455">Judah</st>,

the son of <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st>, the son of <st data-num="2464" class="">Isaac</st>, the son of <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st>, the son of <st data-num="2291" class="">Terah</st>,<n id="1" /> the son of <st data-num="3493" class="">Nahor</st>,

the son of <st data-num="4562" class="">Serug</st>, the son of <st data-num="4466" class="">Reu</st>, the son of <st data-num="5317" class="">Peleg</st>, the son of <st data-num="1443" class="">Eber</st>, the son of <st data-num="4527" class="">Shelah</st>,

the son of <st data-num="2536" class="">Cainan</st>,<n id="1" /> the son of <st data-num="742" class="">Arphaxad</st>, the son of <st data-num="4590" class="">Shem</st>, the son of <st data-num="3575" class="">Noah</st>, the son of <st data-num="2984" class="">Lamech</st>,

the son of <st data-num="3103" class="">Methuselah</st>, the son of <st data-num="1802" class="">Enoch</st>, the son of <st data-num="2391" class="">Jared</st>, the son of <st data-num="3121" class="">Mahalalel</st>,<n id="1" /> the son of <st data-num="2536" class="">Kenan</st>,<n id="2" />
the son of Enosh, the son of Seth, the son of Adam, the son of God.
